avoid_patterns.pattern: Avoid generic statements without personal engagement.
Avoid corporate or overly formal language that lacks relatability.

include_patterns.instruction: Include personal anecdotes or experiences to make the content relatable.
Use concrete examples to illustrate points effectively.
Highlight the cultural significance and practical benefits of the topic.
Emphasize the origin and authenticity of the tools or products discussed.

edit_history.notes: Made it more personal, added concrete example, cut corporate speak

avoid_instructions: Avoid generic statements without personal engagement.
Avoid corporate or overly formal language that lacks relatability.
include_instructions: Include personal anecdotes or experiences to make the content relatable.
Use concrete examples to illustrate points effectively.
Highlight the cultural significance and practical benefits of the topic.
Emphasize the origin and authenticity of the tools or products discussed.
style_observations: The edited version uses a conversational tone, making it more engaging.
Personal excitement and direct comparisons are used to draw the reader in.
content_gaps: Lack of specific examples to demonstrate the effectiveness of the tools.
Missing information on the accessibility and affordability of the tools.
quality_issues: The original content was too generic and lacked a personal touch.
There was an absence of specific, relatable examples to support claims.
